name: End Of The Tape
description:
End Of The Tape is an interactive fiction adventure about trying to finish editing a student film the night before it's due. It attempts to recreate a specific type of hopelessly chaotic atmosphere. The first time you play, things will probably go badly - try again.

  • Make a murder mystery movie!
  • Plunge yourself into immersive and realistic text-based coffee drinking simulation!
  • Abuse your teammates' prescription medications, or don't!
  • Experience the countless permutations of ways that all of this could go wrong!

The story will present itself to you differently each time you play. Please rate and leave a comment if you enjoy, or if you don't! You can download an uncompressed version of the game's soundtrack here on SoundCloud.

Content Warnings:

  • Casual Drug Use

Credits:

  • Writing, programming, and music by me, Lou.
  • Graphics either by me or plundered from old VHS tapes and VCR players.
  • VCR OSD font by Riciery Leal.
  • OpenDyslexic font by Abbie Gonzalez.

Note: UI bugs have been reported by people playing in mobile browsers. If you encounter UI issues, please contact me!
